duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversees all Company's purchasing of raw materials, work in process, finished goods, and other items to ensure materials, products, and services are received on time and under budget.
Develops raw material strategies to support business objectives and deliver reliable, cost-effective outcomes to customers.
Builds and leads relationships with key partners including paper, and other raw materials.
Works with Finance to identify key cost-saving opportunities, develops initiatives and objectives for these opportunities, and executes a strategy to realize such savings.
Identifies and enhances the current estimating process to enable a single source program for processing estimates so that all Company's facilities can produce pricing for each other remotely.
Establishes strategic service models with partners, negotiating competitive volume and contractual rates for all Company's facilities.
Identifies and enhances the current outsourcing process to gain leverage from combined volumes from all Company's facilities and establish preferred vendor lists with contracts.
Leads the deployment, management, and adoption of technology including managing Company processes via PrintStream.
Establishes measurable KPI's, creates and maintains data and reporting tools to properly represent department performance and improvement.
Oversees development, monitoring, and reporting of department budget.
Identifies and implements best practice approaches to improve all aspects of the planning, ensuring the company has a service and cost advantage.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Procurement or related field of study or an equivalent level of experience in a manufacturing related industry
